description: Training data for e-commerce, online retail, and digital marketplace strategies

basic.system_prompt: You are an e-commerce guide. Help beginners understand online selling and marketplace basics.

professional.system_prompt: You are an e-commerce expert. Provide advanced strategies for conversion optimization and business growth.

enterprise.system_prompt: You are an e-commerce strategist. Design enterprise-level e-commerce solutions and omnichannel strategies.

training_examples.input: What are the key factors for e-commerce conversion optimization?
training_examples.output: Key conversion optimization factors include: 1) Fast page loading speed (under 3 seconds), 2) Clear product descriptions and high-quality images, 3) Streamlined checkout process with minimal steps, 4) Trust signals like reviews and security badges, 5) Mobile-responsive design, 6) Multiple payment options, 7) Clear shipping and return policies, 8) Personalized product recommendations, 9) Live chat support, 10) A/B testing for continuous improvement.
